About Me

Introduction

ABOUT

Hi! My name is Kim Nguyen. I am a Software Engineer/Software Developer graduating at University of Houston with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with Mathematics minor. I have strong programming skills and an academic background in computer science, programming language and full-stack development. My passion lies in computer learning, solving problems with logic and idea, also design and develop in-depth website or application. In my graduate studies, I have built many projects applied in solving real life problems, self-work or collaborate with other undergraduate students, that help myself gain more experience in problem solving, teamwork and developing process.

  • Programming Languages: C/C++, Python, Java, HTML, CSS, R, R-Studio
  • Frameworks and Libraries: NodeJS, Bootstrap, Sass, Angular, React
  • Tools and Technologies: Unix/Linux terminals, Git, SVN version control, SQL Server, MongoDB, Microsoft Azure, Virtual Machines.

Fuel Quote Application

  • Designed a professional interface using ASP.NET Core web app to generate fuel rate prediction for clients.
  • Developed database schema and back-end API for continuously interaction and connection to clients.
  • Implemented an algorithm that automatically calculate and quote fuel price for single specific client
  • Ensured the extensibility of application by creating a repository pattern layer in MVC architecture
  • Maintained software quality by applying unit tests with mocking, performing integration & end-to-end testing

E-Commerce Website

  • Created an e-commerce web application using ASP.NET Core in trading products online to engage customers
  • Developed a database management to keep track of products trading and shipping at company warehouse.
  • Applied management and security for customers registration, history trading information in database
  • Authorized customers purchase online with clarified address that have been validate by mail service APIs.
  • Guaranteed application quality by applying unit tests with mocking, performing integration & end-to-end testing.

Inventory Management Specialist

  • Maintained and ensured inventory control are consistently met the requirement by improve and develop inventory management between sales and supply.
  • Established and implemented inventory display and stocking level to increase higher rate in sales.
  • Performed customers need to increase sales in variety of products, reduce inventory waste.
